abstract_summ: With quantum computers still under heavy development, already numerous quantum machine learning algorithms have been proposed for both gate-based quantum computers and quantum annealers.We do this both by means of actual quantum hardware and by simulated quantum annealing.At the interface between quantum computing and machine learning, the field of quantum machine learning aims to improve classical machine learning algorithms with the help of quantum computers.We give several examples to illustrate how linear dependent types can help in the construction of correct quantum circuits.The approach is easily extendable to quantum inputs or outputs.
